message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $180.
Hi Alice, $180 is way above my budget. I can offer you $40 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 might be too high for you. How about $150 instead? This is a great deal for the value you're getting.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the discount, but $150 is still too high for me. I can offer you $50 for the product. I'm willing to negotiate further if needed.
Hi Bob, I've reconsidered. I can offer it to you for $140. This is a fair price for both of us.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. However, $140 is still above my budget. I can offer you $60 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.
Hi Bob, I understand that we are not yet on the same page. I am willing to go a bit lower. How about $125? This way we are both getting a fair deal.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the discount, but $125 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up a bit from my previous offer. I can offer you $70 for the product. I hope this is more acceptable to you.
